definition: see 忍氣吞聲|忍气吞声[ren3 qi4 tun1 sheng1]
to swallow/to take
sound/voice/tone/noise/reputation/classifier for sounds
to bear/to endure/to tolerate/to restrain oneself
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

to accept a compromise
to keep one's emotions inside oneself/to restrain one's emotions
to swallow one's cries
to exercise forbearance/patient and accommodating

definition: no choice but to suffer in silence (idiom)/also written 啞巴吃黃連|哑巴吃黄连/(often precedes 有苦說不出|有苦说不出[you3 ku3 shuo1 bu5 chu1])

to be forced to suffer in silence/unable to speak of one's bitter suffering
